page.title: 10HOTELS
page.content:
Dyce has 2 major hotels
{1. THE HOLIDAY INN} This hotel has been open since 1980 and has 154 rooms. It employs 210 people. It is mainly used by businessmen from foreign countries such as the USA. It is a 4 star hotel with facilities such as a swimming pool,sauna and cocktail bar. Over 55000 people stay in the hotel per year. {2. THE SKEAN DHU} Mr Hall, the manager, told us that the hotel has expanded since opening in 1974 and now has 222 rooms. It also caters mainly for businessmen in the oil industry. There are 210 workers in the hotel and it has around 52000 guests per year.
